oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Selected dug relics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This selection of dug items from the Mulberry area of Lincoln County, Tenn., where there were army camps, includes minie balls and round balls, two harmonica reeds, a pocket knife, several civilian-style belt buckles, a pipe bowl, a kitchen knife, a percussion cap container, and the butt plate from an unidentified gun.
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: Musical instruments; Tools and equipment; Weapons and ammunition
